description: This file is a C++ source file implementing the RBUS class with methods for RBUS API interactions, including session management, property manipulation, and registration functions. It includes headers, defines constants, and provides function implementations, suggesting it's part of a larger RBUS-based system.

classes.name: RBUS
classes.description: A class encapsulating RBUS API interactions, session management, property handling, and registration functions.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Dummy function for registering prerequisites, returning 'SUCCESS'.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Dummy function for unregistering prerequisites, returning TEST_SUCCESS.

methods.name: bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Initializes the RBUS module, registered methods, and logs entry.

methods.name: void RBUS_CheckStatus(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Invokes RBUS check status API and populates response JSON with result and details.

methods.name: void RBUS_Open(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Calls RBUS open API and updates response JSON accordingly.

methods.name: void RBUS_Close(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Calls RBUS close API and updates response JSON accordingly.

methods.name: void RBUS_DataElements(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Handles data element registration/unregistration via ssp_rbus_dataElements.

methods.name: void RBUS_Session(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Creates a session using ssp_rbus_session and provides session ID in response.

methods.name: void RBUS_CloseSession(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Closes a session with ssp_rbus_closeSession based on sessionid.

methods.name: void RBUS_DiscoverComponentDataElements(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Discovers component data elements via ssp_rbus_discoverComponentDataElements.

methods.name: void RBUS_Get(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves a parameter via ssp_rbus_get.

methods.name: void RBUS_GetValue(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Gets a parameter value using ssp_rbus_getValue and populates response.

methods.name: void RBUS_SetValue(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets a parameter value through ssp_rbus_setValue.

methods.name: void RBUS_RegisterOperation(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Registers an operation with ssp_rbus_registerOperation.

methods.name: void RBUS_PropertyCommands(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Invokes property-related APIs via ssp_rbus_property_apis.

methods.name: void RBUS_ObjectCommands(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Performs object-related API calls via ssp_rbus_object_apis.

methods.name: void RBUS_TableRowCommands(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Manages table row operations via ssp_rbus_table_row_apis.

methods.name: void RBUS_SetLogLevel(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets the RBUS log level via ssp_rbus_set_log_level.

methods.name: RBUS * CreateObject(TcpSocketServer & ptrtcpServer)
methods.description: Factory function for creating RBUS class instances.

methods.name: bool cleanup(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Cleanup routine, likely for cleanup during shutdown, returning TEST_SUCCESS.

methods.name: void DestroyObject(RBUS * stubobj)
methods.description: Destructor for RBUS instances, deletes the given object.
